channel.title: [RESOLVED] Pink screen instead of game menu
channel.description:
What happened: Pink Screen appeared instead of game menu
What was SUPPOSED to happen: Game was supposed to start normally
Steps to reproduce this issue:
1. Start the game 2. Pink screen appears 3.
My drivers are all up to date and i doubt my computer cannot run this game...

item.title: [RESOLVED] Pink screen instead of game menu
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.source: [RESOLVED] Pink screen instead of game menu

item.title: [RESOLVED] Pink screen instead of game menu
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
Hey mate I think it’s your gfx card, it’s under minimum requirements:

Seems that it’s equiv. to an Intel HD 3k. I believe our min. req’s are intel HD 5500ish? Or close to that

EDIT:

item.description:
ill try to install DX11 and see if it is supported.

item.source: [RESOLVED] Pink screen instead of game menu

item.title: [RESOLVED] Pink screen instead of game menu
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
Maico:

Direct3D:

Version: Direct3D 9.0c [atiumdag.dll 8.14.10.630]

That part is the issue I think.
https://i.imgur.com/ok3ChH3.png

You need DirectX 11 for the game. Either your DirectX drivers are broken or your graphics card has some issue, I think.

Read full topic
item.source: [RESOLVED] Pink screen instead of game menu

item.title: [RESOLVED] Pink screen instead of game menu
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
I have a strong feeling that you are not launching the game through Steam. Can you please provide the logs in the screenshot above, if you are launching from Steam?

Read full topic
item.source: [RESOLVED] Pink screen instead of game menu

item.title: [RESOLVED] Pink screen instead of game menu
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
Try validating the game files. If that doesn’t work you might have an issue with your DirectX. The game doesn’t support DirectX 9 since DirectX 9 doesn’t really support 3D games if I remember correct.

Read full topic

item.source: [RESOLVED] Pink screen instead of game menu

item.title: [RESOLVED] Pink screen instead of game menu
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
1. Have you tried restarting the PC since this happened? Maybe you have pending driver updates.

  2. Have you tried updating your drivers?

  3. Do you meet the minimum specs shown on the Steam store page?

  4. If all else fails, and if you have a moment, would you please send us your logs?

Read full topic
